title: rspec/core/rake_task uses RSpec::deprecate but does not require rspec/core/deprecation to provide it
body:
I'm running into this issue when trying to run bundler-1.0.0's specs. The bundler Rakefile contains:

  RSpec::Core::RakeTask.new do |t|
    t.spec_opts  = %w(-fs --color)
    t.warning    = true
  end

which triggers the deprecation error due to using spec_opts. Output:

rake --trace spec
(in /var/tmp/portage/dev-ruby/bundler-1.0.0/work/all/carlhuda-bundler-948e43c)
rake aborted!
undefined method `deprecate' for RSpec:Module
